title: Project Kickoff Meeting
description: Define project scope, objectives, and timelines with the team. Agenda includes introduction, project goals, roles and responsibilities, project roadmap, and risk management plan. Expected outcomes are a clear understanding of the project's direction, tasks, and deadlines.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Identify and document functional requirements for the FunctionalParallelComputingFramework.

title: Design the Functional Parallel Computing Framework Architecture
description: Create high-level design for the framework, including its components and interactions.

title: Develop Parallel Algorithms for Functional Programming
description: Design and implement efficient parallel algorithms using functional programming techniques. This task focuses on the development of specific algorithms that leverage the inherent concurrency benefits of functional programming.
dependencies: Design the Functional Parallel Computing Framework Architecture

title: Implement Core Framework Components
description: Develop the essential components of the framework, such as the scheduler and function execution engine.
dependencies: Develop Parallel Algorithms for Functional Programming

title: Integrate the Functional Computing Framework with Databases
description: Design and develop data storage and retrieval functionality. This task includes integrating our framework with various databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and MySQL. For PostgreSQL, we will use pg-promise library; for MongoDB, Mongoose will be used; and for MySQL, mysql2 will be utilized. Clarify specific database libraries or drivers to be used for each database type.
status: TO DO - Ready for Code Architect

title: Develop User Interface for the Functional Parallel Computing Framework
description: Create an intuitive user interface that allows for seamless interaction with the functional parallel computing framework. The UI should be designed to accommodate both experienced and novice users, providing clear documentation and tutorials as needed. To ensure a consistent user experience, incorporate design principles from popular functional programming tools. Additionally, consider implementing a feedback system to gather user input and improve the interface over time.
dependencies: Design the Functional Parallel Computing Framework Architecture

title: Perform Unit and Integration Testing
description: Test individual components and their interactions.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for the Functional Parallel Computing Framework

title: Resolve Test Issues and Bugs
description: Fix any issues found during testing.

title: Prepare Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the framework's usage and architecture, including detailed explanations of core components, user interface guides, and examples. The documentation should also cover best practices for parallel computing within the framework.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for the Functional Parallel Computing Framework

title: Deployment and Post-deployment Monitoring of Functional Parallel Computing Framework
description: Deploy the FunctionalParallelComputingFramework to production environments and establish a robust monitoring system for performance, scalability, and error handling. This task includes initial setup, configuration, and ongoing maintenance. The focus will be on ensuring high availability, reliability, and fault tolerance.
